overview: I wouldn't say that Me And My Girlfriend are in love more like madly in lust, and it's an understatement when I say we have the hots for each other. We can't keep our hands to ourselves, and when the toys come out to play, we're in seventh heaven. Every room in the house is our own personal play room, so come and join us as we kiss hot mouths, lick every inch of bare flesh and fuck each other senseless.
title: Me and My Girlfriend
